name: Fish.io
description:
Note: Designed for Mobile Devices not for PC, Uploading as a PC version so the width will be weird. 

Story Line:

Reach as much high as you can in one go. Make sure to protect your fish. Don't let it eaten by shark.

 Game Features:

  • Free to Play
  • One Finger Control
  • Different Obstacles and experience every time
  • Endless Games Play
  • Genre: Arcade
  • No multiplayer

 Target Audience:

  • Anyone of age > 3+

 Game Flow Summary:

  • The character will be a fish which can be controlled by one finger, the fish itself does not move to any direction but rises up. The player needs to remove whatever the obstacles comes on the way to reach high score. The game will end as soon as the fish hits any object.
